definitions.definition: ( chiefly New England ) A small two - winged fly or midge of the family Ceratopogonidae , which bites and then sucks the blood of mammals ; a biting midge or sandfly .

main_definition: ( chiefly New England ) A small two - winged fly or midge of the family Ceratopogonidae , which bites and then sucks the blood of mammals ; a biting midge or sandfly .

definitions.definition: ( South West England , chiefly Somerset ) In full punkie lantern : a lantern similar to a jack-o'-lantern consisting of a gourd such as a pumpkin or a root vegetable such as a mangelwurzel or swede which has been hollowed out , in which a candle has been placed ; these are chiefly displayed during Punkie Night in late October .

main_definition: ( South West England , chiefly Somerset ) In full punkie lantern : a lantern similar to a jack-o'-lantern consisting of a gourd such as a pumpkin or a root vegetable such as a mangelwurzel or swede which has been hollowed out , in which a candle has been placed ; these are chiefly displayed during Punkie Night in late October .

definitions.definition: Synonym of pumpkinseed (“a North American sunfish , Lepomis gibbosus ”).

main_definition: ( US ) Synonym of pumpkinseed (“a North American sunfish , Lepomis gibbosus ”).
